title: Privacy Policy
paragraphs: This Privacy Policy outlines how FlirtSpark collects, uses, and protects your information:
We do not collect personal data such as names or emails.
We use cookies and analytics tools to improve the user experience and track site usage.
Third-party services like Google AdSense and affiliate networks may collect anonymized data through their scripts.
By using this site, you agree to the use of such cookies and third-party tools.
We do not sell or share your personal information with any other party.
For any questions regarding your privacy, please contact us via our social media pages.
